description: This file serves as the entry point for the production build of the frontend application when running 'npm run preview' with Vite. It imports the QwikCity middleware for Node and the plan for server-side rendering, then exports a configured instance of createQwikCity for handling server requests in preview mode.

methods.name: createQwikCity
methods.description: Creates a QwikCity application configured for the node environment with specific render and plan settings.
